text: Aÿ is a former commune. It is in Grand Est in the Marne department in northeast France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Aÿ- Champagne.Arrêté préfectoral 9 November 2015 It is known for the production of Champagne. == Related pages == * Communes of the Marne department == References == Category:Former communes in Marne
title: Aÿ
